name: Piano Music Maestro
description:
Relaxation + Rhythm + Mastery + Learning = Piano Music Maestro!

Became a piano maestro in this new fun and addictive game! All while enjoying and learning about different songs, from the classics to modern hits.

You’ll feel the music flowing, letting you relax and focus at the same time. The feeling of mastering a song is truly gratifying!

Beautiful menus and artwork will inspire you to explore and master all different music genres.

Piano Music Maestro is unique and innovative:
► Unique gameplay and visuals
► Ever growing selection of high quality music
► Modern, clean interfaces and navigation
► Progressive levels of difficulty

From famous composers to modern hits, our unique and fully licensed gallery offers a wide selection of songs:
● Classical
● Rock
● Electronic
● Modern
● Jazz
● And more!

Piano Music Maestro offers unlimited hours fun for everyone! From beginners to “maestros”, you’ll always find different songs and progressive levels of difficulty to stay challenged!

And there’s more: With our unique Piano Music Subscription you’ll receive brand new songs every week, right on your device!

Become a pianist now!

■ Piano Music Premium Subscription
○ Piano Music Premium offers unlimited access to all features and weekly new songs & corresponding levels.
○ There are 3 subscriptions packages: Weekly subscription is $7.99; Monthly subscription is $19.99; Yearly subscription is $79.99.
○ Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
○ Subscription automatically renews for the same price and duration period as the origina package unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
○ Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period
○ Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s iTunes Account Settings after purchase
○ No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period
○ You may cancel a subscription during its free trial period via the subscription setting through your iTunes account. This must be done 24 hours before the end of the subscription period to avoid being charged. Please visit http://support.apple.com/kb/ht4098 for more information
○ You may turn off the auto-renewal of your subscription via your iTunes Account Settings. However, you are not able to cancel the current subscription during its active period
○ Any unused portion of a free-trial period, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription
○ By downloading this App you agree to our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.
* The prices are equal to the value that "Apple's App Store Pricing Matrix" determines as the equivalent of the subscription price in $ USD. All prices are subject to change without notification. We occasionally run promotion prices as incentives or limited time opportunities for qualifying purchases made during the promotional time period. Due to the time sensitive and promotional nature of these events, we are unable to offer price protection or retroactive discounts or refunds for previous purchases in the event of a price reduction or promotional offering.

Privacy Policy: https://arcadiancompany.com/privacy-policy
Terms of Service: https://arcadiancompany.com/terms-of-service/
Support: https://arcadiancompany.com/terms-of-service/
